comment: Where are the British - the ones that sat through the Blitz. the stiff upper-lipped, upper crust rigidly fair aristos? Is it childless politicians, the lure of power, and the fear of reprisal that drives British Politics? Bet your limey ass it is!
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Great"
                              :op2 "Britain"))
                  :ARG1-of (s / sit-01

                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Blitz")))
                  :mod (a / aristocrat

                        :part (l / lip
                              :mod (u / upper))))
            :ARG2 (a2 / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (d / drive-02
            :ARG0 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (p2 / politician
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91

                              :ARG2 (c2 / child)))
                  :op2 (l2 / lure-01

                  :op3 (f2 / fear-01
                        :ARG1 (r2 / reprisal)))
            :ARG1 (p4 / politics
                  :mod c)

      :snt3 (b2 / bet-01

                  :part (a5 / ass
                        :mod (l3 / limey)
